      • doSerialize

        protected Document doSerialize(DigitalObject obj,
                   int transContext)
                        throws ObjectIntegrityException,
                               SAXException
        Serialize the object, failing the test only if obviously incorrect behavior occurs.
        Throws:
        ObjectIntegrityException - if the serializer fails due to same.
        SAXException - if the result XML is not well-formed.
